name: Bill Jablonsky
description: Bill is the grieving widower of his deceased wife, Caroline Jablonsky, who was murdered byJoshua Stephenson. ThroughWakako Okada, Bill hiresVto assassinate Joshua during his transit across Arroyo, with V responsible for driving Bill's vehicle of choice. Before spotting Joshua's NCPD transport, Bill reveals his intentions to murder Joshua in revenge of his deceased wife, believing that Joshua's BD deal was the murderer unfairly escaping death sentence, and by extension, justice. During this conversation, V can point out flaws in Bill's plans with a sufficient level ofCool, pointing out that...
